reviewText: This film is a story of a crime in Little Rock AR.  The book, Widow's Web, is the same story.  Very entertaining.
This was a very good story
Very disappointed, thought it was more to it

Little Rock is home and i love it so.  I no longer live there but my heart will always be there.  Lived there when this took place.  I miss City Confidential it was a great series.  Video is wonderful.
